unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss Your Sari (and Your Sanity)!
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss Your Sari (and Your Sanity)!

unnormalised: Ah, flash sales. That siren song of retail, promising riches (of discounted goods) to those fleet of finger and quick of wit. It's like a digital Dharam Yudh, a battle of buyers battling it out for that last discounted pressure cooker!
normalised: Ah, flash sales. That siren song of retail, promising riches (of discounted goods) to those fleet of finger and quick of wit. It's like a digital Dharam Yudh, a battle of buyers battling it out for that last discounted pressure cooker!

unnormalised: We've all been there. It's a perfectly normal Tuesday at 2:37 PM. You're sipping chai, scrolling through Instagram, when BAM! A flash sale notification from Myntra pops up. "60% OFF EVERYTHING! Limited Time Only!" Suddenly, you forget about that important deadline Dr. Sharma set for you, the one that requires analyzing 1500 sq ft of data. Priorities, people!

unnormalised: You dive in, a digital warrior ready to conquer. But wait, that gorgeous Banarasi sari you've been eyeing? Sold out in 0.3 seconds. The trendy kurta set that would make even Kareena Kapoor jealous? Gone, vanished into the ether like a well-kept secret. You're left staring at the screen, clutching your metaphorical pearls (or, you know, just your phone), feeling like you just missed the last local train from Churchgate.

Happy hunting, and may the odds be ever in your favor!
